stepAnswer: In the year $$2005$$, there were $$300$$ police officers in the town.
stepTitle: A function $$N=f(y)$$ gives the number of police officers, N, in a town in year $$y$$. What does $$f(2005)=300$$ represent?
answerLatex: In the year $$2005$$, there were $$300$$ police officers in the town.
choices: In the 300th year, there were $$2005$$ police officers in the town.
In the year $$2005$$, there were $$300$$ police officers in the town.
There were $$300$$ days where the town had $$2005$$ police officers.
There were $$2005$$ days where the town had $$300$$ police officers.
